1.content:
So in basis with the band ending every girl got very obsessed one different thing.

Katherine got obsessed with her baking the entire kitchen would be filled if it wasn't for the person obsessed with eating, Dani.

Lisa was obsessed with partying out every night at a new club, she still didn't drink but got a frenzied high that caused her to crash during the day

Lauren felt betrayed and confused because she didn't know what she did wrong Lauren refused to believe it just ended because time was up, walking into her room was walking into a crazy array of conspiracies. In short, Lauren just broke.

Christina had her boyfriend but he was starting to get sick of her super clingy new personality. He never could do anything without telling her where he was going, it was horrible.

Amy was the same bubbly girl but obsessed with cleaning because now everything felt wrong and dirty.
1.title: Obsessed

11.content:
Dani was sitting on the living room couch where an array of food, mostly desserts, was set out just for her.

She had her own personal maid with Amy cleaning the empty pans and personal cook with Katherine cooking like a mad woman.

Her life would have been heaven if it wasn't for one thing, Lauren.

Dani slightly looked up her neck fat pinching together as she pictured what her once closest sister was doing.

Probably staring at her wall like the mentally ill person she is. Dani's blunt thoughts told her and she missed Lauren.

Dani stopped thinking about her older sister and focused back on herself.

She seemed to other's dead set on being immobile as quickly as possible but only food and one other person in her life could make her happy and since the other person is Lauren food is the only one there for her.

She took another bite of the snicker doodle, which was practically the whole cookie that Katherine had made.

Crumbs fell into her cleavage and rolls but she didn't care she was only growing there was room for a lot more.

And by growing Dani meant in weight not height.

She weighed about 500 pounds it being very apparent in the change of her once bony features to squishy.

Anywhere a person poked on Dani they would have felt at least an inch or two of fat before bone.

Her face was the shape of a sphere not having visible cheekbones anymore.

She didn't have a neck it being swallowed by her fourth chin.

Her arms had rolls on them where an elbow and wrist should have been.

Her fingers couldn't type her phone and most of the time they were filled with food so it didn't matter.

Her cleavage was the size of two volleyballs and since she had none before it was a big change.

Her stomach, when not taut, had three massive rolls that her hand could be lost into. One was right under her cleavage, the other right in the middle of her stomach, and the last one at the bottom.

As a skinny girls definition of rolls she probably had ten plus. The little ones were just barely noticeable compared to the three large ones.

Her stomach was starting to droop over her knees not that anyone would know that they were knees.

She was in a straddling position to make room for her bulky belly but her thighs taught her belly always squishing it.

It would take five people to get their hands around my thighs.

Just like with her arms her leg fat also hid their joints.

The most noticeable part was her butt though. When sitting she gained about a foot of height and her legs were slightly off the ground.

If she walked, which was a very slow waddle, it would jiggle with every step and hit the back of her thighs while waddling.

Katherine's comfort food was because she couldn't figure out what else to put her energy into.

She would write but that just reminded her of the band and unlike Lauren she didn't want to engulf herself in it.

She was happy Dani was eating it and not worried about her ginormous size but her other sister, Lauren's.

Lauren had been MIA for the year but Katherine happened to catch a glimpse here and there and Lauren was dying.

She was starving herself, purposely or not, she was still not eating.

Katherine was determined to fix her sister but her sister was determined and determined in shutting people out.
11.title: Katherine & Dani

13.content:
"Lauren!" Lauren heard a faint call for her name but she brushed it off not being the main part of her focus.

No one was going to come in anyways the last attempt resulting in Lauren physically attacking Lisa.

As Lauren faced her wall she wore a wrinkled tie dyed shirt actually the bands merchandise.

She had ripped down all the pictures of her sister's and friends them somewhere in the pile of magazines and printed out website pages.

Now there were poorly stuck on papers full of code, that made sense in Lauren's mind, about why the band broke up.

Her brown hair was in a bun on the top of her face not wanting it to distract her.

Her eyes were bloodshot from lack of sleep, the makeup that used to be on there a faded mess, her brown eyes still sparkled but it was now about this not because of happiness.

Her hands were dry and cuticles bleeding from picking at them, the actually biting part of the nail non existent.

The worst part was probably her overall health though. Anyone who had met Lauren knew she bought clothes that fit her, not too big and not too small, unless it was a huge sweatshirt or flannel.

Right now though her clothes looked two sizes too big, hanging off of her body.

The caller of her name finally comes in and tries to wake her out of her trance.

And that was...
13.title: Lauren

134.content:
Lisa came into Lauren's room hungover with tiredness she collapsed on her younger sister's bed.

Lauren head the slight creak jumping at it and seeing Lisa half on, half off, her bed.

It took Lauren a moment for her eyes to adjust on her older sister used to looking at the wall, not down at her bed.

Lauren shook Lisa wanting her to leave, "Ladybug, stop it." Lisa mumbled shocking Lauren at the use of her nickname.

Lauren stumbled backwards the memories coming back as lucid as if they had happened yesterday.

One year ago.

"Get over it Lauren, stop being a baby and move on." Lisa shouted at her clearly broken sister, who really didn't need another tear in her heart.

"But Moose, it hu-" Lauren started not able to move on because no one was helping her, they were all leaving her to deal with it by herself.

"Lauren you're not the only one impacted by the band breaking up." Lauren didn't even care about the words after her name.

Whenever Lauren ever said Moose Lisa would always respond with Ladybug but it was different now, her sisters hated her.
134.title: Lisa

1341.content:
Lisa woke up rubbing her bloodshot eyes.

She saw that she was in her little sister's room instead of her's.

Her older sister instincts finally actually paying attention to Lauren.

Gosh she looked horrible.

"Lauren what happened to you?" Lisa asked her frozen younger sister.

She barely recognized the frail girl as she got up her muscles sore.
1341.title: Lisa Wakes Up

13411.content:
Lauren's lower lip was trembling ready to burst into tears, "Lauren?" Lisa repeated Lauren not having responded.

"Hey Ladybug, it's okay." Lisa wrapped her arms around her frail sister scared that any touch would break the unnaturally bony girl.

Lauren hadn't felt warmth from another human being in a year, so it felt odd.

Lisa knew it wasn't okay because looking past her slightly taller sister, it was an unhealthy obsession.

Truthfully she was surprised Lauren wasn't dead.

She knew exactly what Lauren was feeling though because she felt it too, she was lost.

"Lauren you got to let this go." Lisa told the girl not breaking up the hug.

Lisa stared at Lauren truthfully dying to hear her voice now that she was actually paying attention to her.
13411.title: Hug

info.brief_description: What happens when the band ends?
info.description: The band ending didn't end well for the Cimorelli sisters.
